captions.text: So, Tord. What movie did you get?

Oh, it's a classic! Return of the insane zombie
pirates from hell part 3.

Well, that was... Eventful. Now what are we
going to do?
Hmmm... Wouldn't it be fun if we could goto hell.

Haha! Yeah, but how would we find out how
to get there?
Holy sock puppet in a sausage factory!
So, this is hell! What a sight!
Hey! What are you doing?! HEY! DON'T DO THAT!
Hey, let's get something to eat.
Yes, thank you. I would like to see the menu.
Hey wait a minute! Why am I on the menu?!
I think we'll just order some drinks.
ARGHHHHHHH!! SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME!! ARGHHH!!
Urghh, always tourists. Never girl scouts.
I AM LUCIFER LORD OF HELL!!
NO! NOW FOLLOW ME TO YOUR OWN PERSONAL HELL!!
Hey Matt. Hey Matt. Hey Matt. Hey Matt. What's up?
DON'T FORGET TO VISIT THE GIFT SHOP!!

Bye bye! Visit again soon! Thanks for visiting!
See you in six months!

comments.author: Letty Zeppelyn

Ha. Not a very good Jehovah's Witness from my personal recollection of 
their teachings. Not bothered by that though. xD

Though as a former JW who had a lot of psychological issues upon moving out 
of le parents house and into the real world because of JW parents, I know 
enough of their teachings to wonder how Tom gets away with being himself. xD

I would guess by some of TomSka's stuff that Tom the Eddsworld character is 
a JW, but the actual guy is not. Since a lot of Eddsworld characters are 
inversions of the real person. In any case what people choose to believe is 
their business.

comments.text:
+Noah Jefferies i dont believe everyone should be a christian . Everyone 
should get a chance to become whatever they want . Christianity is the most 
mild religion . I mean you dont have bazillion restrictions on stuff . And 
if you do sin there is confession . Just go to church and you erased the 
sin . By a report from a ukrainean nurse that died and revived 3 days after 
she saw hell , heaven and purgatory . In heaven she saw her father and 
other relatives and atmosphere was nice . She tried to see God but her 
angel turned her head away as noone is allowed to see the face of God . 
Purgatory is dim dark and smelly . its the first circle of hell and sinners 
go to there to be judged by god . if they sinned a bit and minor sins but 
did good deeds they go to obviously heaven and if they sinned alot they go 
to hell . Weird thing is that neutrals that didnt sin and didnt do good 
deeds go to hell also . That makes no sense but ill continue on . In hell 
there is constantly rock and heavy metal music , demons torture sinners , 
its so hot that your skin dries out , many disturbing things are there . 
The last circle of hell is in the centre and is by far the worst and the 
main devil , Lucifer dwells there and does stuff that other devils do and 
orders them around . Her aunt was also in hell because she cussed people 
constantly so she burned to ashes just to reapear and repeat the process . 
You cant die in neither of places so its really buggy if you are in hell to

is a possibility that afterlife of people is what they believe in . All 
religions get their own afterlife and even atheism which is not a religion 
but however they do die so that counts .

comments.text:
+Hussein Haji yes , but the biggest difference is that christian bible has 
2 testaments , the old one which tells about happenings before jesus christ 
and new testament which tells about jesus's life and deeds . Islam and 
Jewism dont celebrate Jesus while christians do . He was born by virging 
Mary and very little is told about his childhood except his birth and minor 
happenings . When he grew up he was the teacher to 12 apostles which 
followed and listened to him . But was later betrayed by Judas and hanged 
on a cross . When he died the was around 3 hours or so of darkness . he was 
accused because he healed a man (he could heal on touch or even ressurect 
people like in case of Lazarus ) on saturday ( jewish holy day ) and since 
he was a jew ( christianity didnt exist until he resurrected ) they accused 
him . 3 days later he ressurected and when he went to his apostles they 
were all stunned and one of his apostles Thomas thought he was a ghost so 
he asked to touch him as he did . 50 days later he went to heaven to judge 
with his father Jehovah . While he is a bit included in jewism he was just 
a prophet in their religion . To Jesus and jehovah , human life is the most 
precious thing on the world and murder is a deadly sin , not in some 
circumstances , like protecting your land in war or being forced to invade 
another country , while agreeing to invade a country kills count as sin . 
This is all catholic information so dont think this is mandatory for all 
religions . And God is forgiving and jesus died to clear the sins ( in 
catholic religion ) so confession became an option . Due to similarities in 
religions I think that just one and only God is involved but was 
representing to people in different names ( Jehovah , Allah ....) and minor 
differences that do matter but are not critical . And the big flood was 
mentioned in alot of religions not just cristianity , jewism and islam but 
in one case the saved one was a king rather then Noah so its not a 100% 
chance that it covers the same event .

comments.text:
+Hussein Haji Christian , Islam and Jewish religions arent that different . 
The holy books narrate almost the same thing with minor differences . i was

comments.author: Antonio Klaić

comments.text:
Yeah, I left out a lot of information, but it differs greatly. Satan (no 
one really said that he was disguised as a serpent) didn't directly tell 
Adam and Eve to eat from the tree, but planted the idea into their thoughts 
that God didn't forbid them to eat the fruit, so they forgot the warning. 
From Chapter 20, verses 121-122 in the Quran, Alla narrates, "Then they 
both ate of that tree, and so their private parts appeared to them, and 
they began to stick on themselves the leaves from Paradise for their 
covering.  Thus did Adam disobey his Lord, so he went astray.  Then his 
Lord chose him, and turned to him with forgiveness and gave him guidance.”

I don't know how you guys got the story differently. Allah is all seeing 
and all knowing. You can't hide from God by assuming that he's human-like, 
only can focus on one thing, or he "rested" after he created the universe. 
He is God, the One, the Absolute. He neither begets nor begotten, and there 
is nothing comparable to him.
comments.author: Hussein Haji (theFierceKid)

comments.text:
+Hussein Haji First off God ( Jehovah in christian ) created Earth and 
finally Adam and told him to care for animals etc . Then Adam got lonely 
and god created Eve . There was a certain tree in Eden God ordered them not 
to eat from , and another tree , the tree of life from which they could eat 
if they wanted too aswell as other tree's . Once a snake (satan in disguise 
) tricked eve to eat an apple from the tree and that she'll get God like 
powers . She did and it was tasty and she showed Adam to eat from it too . 
god was walking around in Eden and Adam and Eve hid from him because they 
tought he wouldnt see them doing againist his will . After eating from the 
tree they figured out they are naked and made something to cover them up 
from leaves . God was angry at them and banished them from Eden and tree of 
life was forbiden for them to eat . That was the first sin and with it came
